title: Adguard for Mac (v1.3.0) [Mac OS X] [Multi] (2016)
description:
Program name: Adguard
Program Type: Anti-Banner, Web Filter, Anti-Phishing and etc.
Version: 1.3.0
Release date: June 21, 2016
Language: English, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Korean, and etc.
Operating system: OS X
File size: 47 Mb
----------------------------------------------------
Description:
Adguard - is one of a kind of full ad blocker for Mac OS X. It is a universal program that contains all the necessary options for the most comfortable using the Internet. Ad Blockers, warning or blocking phishing and other online threats and protection of your personal data on the Internet.

Adguard able to block advertising absolutely in any application. In contradistinction to other existing solutions for Internet filtering, Adguard was created specifically for the Mac, which allows you to block advertising are not only in browsers, but also in the applications installed on your device.
----------------------------------------------------
Advantages of the program:
1. Works in all popular browsers;
2. Designed to block all types of advertising;
3. Easy to use, blocks ads insensibly in the background mode;
4. Warns about the danger during the transition to suspicious websites;
5. Has the module (Assistant Adguard) to manage the program directly from your browser;
6. Prevents from counters and systems analysts, prohibits tracking user activity online.
----------------------------------------------------
System requirements:
Operating System: OS X 10.7 and beyond
Browsers: Any (Safari, Google Chrome, Opera, Firefox etc.)
Disk: 100 Mb free hard disk space.
----------------------------------------------------
What's new in version 1.3.0?
1. [Improved] Basic filtering rules processing speed was optimized.
2. [Changed] $replace rules now have higher priority than other basic rules.
3. [Fixed] Adguard crash because of huge data: URLs.
4. [Fixed] Adguard does not ignore "base" tag "href" attribute while constructing absolute URL any more.
5. [Fixed] Websites can't be broken any more because of invalid HTML inside a "noscript" tag.
6. [Fixed] Error previously occuring when parsing a style tag with embedded svg.
7. [Fixed] Adguard can now detect HTML if there is an xml declaration at the document start.
8. [Fixed] Wrong HTML content detection.
9. [Fixed] Twitch.tv filtering issue.
10. [Improved] Increase content filtering rules maximum length limit.
11. [Changed] Webdav methods are supported now (specifically REPORT).
12. [Changed] Rewritten mechanism of checking the websites availability.
13. [Fixed] After blocking a POST request, next request is read only when data was read to end.
14. [Fixed] Adguard prevents UDP traffic on 443 port.
15. [Fixed] Adguard fails to detect HTML on some websites.
16. [Added] A notification that is shown if user unchecks the "Filter https protocol" box.
17. [Added] Finnish language.
18. [Added] Support for complex language codes.
19. [Changed] Increase idle connection timeout to 10 minutes.
20. [Fixed] Problem with Adguard start after motherboard replacement. ...and etc
